ComicInfo.Summary:
In a quiet seaside town, Huck uses his special gifts to do a good deed each day. His neighbors return the favors by keeping his abilities a secret. But when a newcomer alerts the media, a firestorm erupts, sending Huck on an adventure that will change everything. This brand-new series from writer MARK MILLAR and artist RAFAEL ALBUQUERQUE presents a comicbook unlike anything youâ€™ve read before. Featuring a Feel-Good Movie variant cover by RAFAEL ALBUQUERQUE.
